task_summary: The robot is tasked to locate, approach, and reach a towel laid flat on a surface.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a bimanual robot operating in a tabletop scene with a pink towel as the goal object. The robot begins above the workspace and sequentially performs perception, alignment, and approach to bring its end-effector near the towel. All motions and queries are strictly based on vision and spatial feedback to ensure correct alignment. Scenes show systematic progress from workspace observation to towel proximity. Environment objects remain stationary; the towel is the designated reachable target.
preconditions: Robot is powered on and initialized
Workspace is unobstructed except for towel
Towel is placed flat and fully within view
Robot gripper is open and above workspace
stepwise_plan: If not visible, scan workspace to locate towel
Move above the towel with safe vertical offset
Approach and align end-effector toward towel
Verify robot is at the towel's position
success_criteria: Robot end-effector is directly above or at the towel
Towel location confirmed via perception and alignment
failure_and_recovery: Failure: towel not visible — recovery: scan workspace up to 3 times
Failure: approach misaligned — recovery: retry approach and alignment step
task_long_description.termination: Tree terminates after the robot is verified to have reached the towel.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks whether the towel is visible to the robot's sensors.
Scans the workspace for the towel up to 3 attempts using a grid pattern.
Visually detects and localizes the towel in the workspace.
Moves the end-effector above the towel with a 10cm vertical offset.
Approaches and aligns the end-effector to the towel with tight tolerance.
Verifies the robot is at the towel's position.

recovery_strategy: Retry scan for towel up to 3 times
Reattempt approach/alignment if target not reached
assumptions: Instruction only specifies 'reach' (not grasp/manipulate); confirmed by frames (robot moves toward towel but does not grasp)
Towel is symbolic goal; mapping is based on pink object consistent in all frames
No pick or place is shown in frames; BT omits such actions accordingly

expected_success_criteria: End-effector is at or above the towel upon completion
